OrgName.entry: ST VINCENT DE PAUL FURNITURE STORE

Desc.entry: Collects good quality, unwanted furniture and delivers to local families in need who are new Council tenants and have no furniture at all. No gas or electrical appliances supplied. Supply is not instant - approximately 5 days between initial contact and delivery of items. Clients need to be referred by Council Services (a referral form can be accessed through the Council's intranet system) or other agency, eg advice service.
